meanings.definition: Bignonias: a genus of flowering plants in the family Bignoniaceae.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful bignonias.
meanings.sent2: I planted some bignonias in my backyard garden.
meanings.sent3: The bignonias in the park seemed to be dancing in the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her love for bignonias bloomed like the flowers themselves.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the bignonias brightened up the entire street.

meanings.definition: Bignonias: the plural form of bignonia, a type of flowering plant.
meanings.sent1: We saw many bignonias blooming in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent2: The bignonias in her yard attracted butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent3: The bignonias in the vase on the table added a pop of color to the room.
meanings.sent4: The bignonias in the forest whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the bignonias filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Bignonias: belonging to or relating to the bignonia plant family.
meanings.sent1: The bignonias flowers were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: She admired the bignonias leaves for their unique shape.
meanings.sent3: The bignonias vines climbed up the walls of the old house.
meanings.sent4: The bignonias scent in the air signaled the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The bignonias petals felt soft to the touch.
